participant_1.background:
I grew up with my family and they are the best people I know.
I like to watch shows that are funny and lighthearted, because they help me relax and take my mind off of my worries.
i draw comics.
i am a student in social sciences.
my favorite color is green.

participant_2.background:
I don't have any siblings, but I've been doing some research on how to help my dog with his behavioral issues.
i m in a jazz band and play the saxophone.
my family is very important to me.
i like movies based on comedies.
I work long hours in the sun and my eyes get tired.

content.text: Hi! What are you up to today?
Hi! Not much, just working on some music. What about you?
Same here, working on some comics. It's a lot of fun!
That's cool, what kind of comics do you draw?
I draw a lot of slice of life stuff, with a lot of humor. I'm really into silly comics.
That sounds really cool! I'm more into jazz, but I love listening to comedy albums.
I love jazz music too! What's your favorite genre of jazz?
I like all kinds of jazz, but I really like bebop. What about you?
I'm more into swing, but I like bebop too!
That's cool! I've been playing saxophone in a jazz band for a few years, and it's a lot of fun.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to learn how to play an instrument.
It's a lot of fun, and it's a great way to relax. I'd recommend it!
Thanks for the suggestion! I might just do that!
